column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the Mac and cheese per a recommendation and it was delicious. I'm always disappointed when ordered Mac and cheese at restaurants
column2: buy this was by far the best I've had. Not too cheesy
column3: but rich enough to satisfy. My mom had the goat o goat o salad. It was also really good. I had some of that as well. Really good flavor overall. Just Asian enough for my liking.
